code: import React from'react';export function Container({fluid,children}){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"container".concat(fluid?"-fluid":"")},children);}export function Row({fluid,children}){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"row".concat(fluid?"-fluid":"")},children);}export function Col({size,children}){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:size.split(" ").map(size=>"col-"+size).join(" ")},children);}
